vsParam:
Yeah, Tandrion.
Aren't you supposed to be working?

Ah, I made... I asked a kouhai to deal with it.
Forget about that. Are you available?
If so, maybe we can have a meal together...

Ah... She just walked away so fast.
(Sigh) It's so hard to ask Bergamot Sensei out.

By the way, Cresson. Your boss was rejected?
What do you think of that?

Um—!? I-I didn't see that!
I didn't see Bergamot Sensei turned Captain down!

Ah, keep it down!
People will notice us peeking...

Hey, you, those second years and Cresson?
What did you see? Huh?
We... We saw that you tried to ask her out?

Oh~ I see~
[px], you're a bad liar...

Oh~ I see~
[px], you saw that...

Cresson!!
Do not come back before taking this monster down.

Er, a commission letter!?
So, you want me to take it!?

Non-negotiable!
This is part of your training. Just do it!

P-part of my training...
Got it. I'm leaving!!

... Alright, guys!
I think you'll come with me, right?!

Come on, don't say that!
This is your combat training too. Stop arguing. Let's go!

Um~ You forced us to join you...
All the guards are so bossy!!
